title: Boulder (home)
name: Boulder (home)
description:
A Map by Kluck

I was born in Boulder and lived there for most of my life.
I grew up in Boulder, you can see the flatirons from my bedroom window.  My favorite place in the city is Pearl Street Mall.  Especially if you sit on the roofs of the buildings and look at the mountains.  Winter mornings are cold but my favorite time of day because when there is snow on the flatirons they look pink.

properties.name: Allenspark
properties.description: Posted by KluckMy family owns a cabin in Allenspark which is about 45 minutes to an hour from Boulder and about 20 minutes from Estes Park. The town is very small, but there are some amazing restaurants, like the Fawn Brook Inn and Allenspark Lodge. Also in Allenspark is another entry to the Rocky Mountain National Parks. There is shorter hikes and longer ones. From here you can get to many amazing places such as Thunder Lake and Ouzel Falls. The North St. Vrain runs through the middle of Allenspark which is great for fishing and also some tubing. It si a great place to visit.

properties.name: Grenoble
properties.description: Posted by KluckI stayed in Grenoble with a local family. They lived on the side of the mountain. The small town center was a great place to spend time. There were lots of places to eat around their with very authentic food. It was a gorgeous place to stay and spend time.
